Flock Tactics.name: Flock Tactics
Flock Tactics.fullText:
Kenku Racial Utility Flock Tactics

With your experience as part of a kenku flock, you have a knack for maximizing the advantages of teamwork.

Encounter
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Choose one of the following effects each time you use this power.
     ✦ An enemy adjacent to your ally grants combat advantage to you until the start of your next turn.
     ✦ You use the aid another or the aid attack action. If you succeed, you grant a +3 bonus, rather than the normal +2 bonus.


Published in Dragon Magazine 411.
Flock Tactics.flavor: With your experience as part of a kenku flock, you have a knack for maximizing the advantages of teamwork.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: Choose one of the following effects each time you use this power.

Choose one of the following effects each time you use this power.
     ✦ An enemy adjacent to your ally grants combat advantage to you until the start of your next turn.
     ✦ You use the aid another or the aid attack action. If you succeed, you grant a +3 bonus, rather than the normal +2 bonus.

Beak Mask.name: Beak Mask
Beak Mask.fullText:
Kenku Racial Utility 2Beak Mask

You craft a new face for yourself out of light and shadow.

Daily      Illusion, Shadow
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You can take on the appearance of any humanoid of a build and size similar to yours, including a specific individual whom you’ve seen. Your clothing and equipment remain unchanged, and you gain neither the abilities nor the mannerisms of the chosen form. The illusion lasts for 1 hour, although you can end it as a minor action. You must keep the same appearance for the entire duration.
    Anyone who attempts to see through your ruse makes an Insight check opposed by your Bluff check, and you gain a +5 power bonus to your check.


Published in Dragon Magazine 411.
Beak Mask.flavor: You craft a new face for yourself out of light and shadow.
Beak Mask.effect:

You must keep the same appearance for the entire duration.
    Anyone who attempts to see through your ruse makes an Insight check opposed by your Bluff check, and you gain a +5 power bonus to your check.

Rally the Flock.name: Rally the Flock
Rally the Flock.fullText:
Kenku Racial Utility 2Rally the Flock

You give a croaking call to your allies, signaling an open path for them to come to your aid.

Encounter
Minor Action      Close burst 3

Target: Each ally who can hear you in the burst

Effect: Each target can shift up to 2 squares as a free action but must end this movement closer to you.


Published in Dragon Magazine 411.
Rally the Flock.flavor: You give a croaking call to your allies, signaling an open path for them to come to your aid.

Shadow Feathers.name: Shadow Feathers
Shadow Feathers.fullText:
Kenku Racial Utility 6Shadow Feathers

Dark feathers seem to explode from you, briefly hiding you from sight.

Encounter      Illusion, Shadow
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You gain total concealment until the end of your next turn or until you attack.


Published in Dragon Magazine 411.
Shadow Feathers.flavor: Dark feathers seem to explode from you, briefly hiding you from sight.
Shadow Feathers.effect: You gain total concealment until the end of your next turn or until you attack.

Shadow in the Flock.name: Shadow in the Flock
Shadow in the Flock.fullText:
Kenku Racial Utility 6Shadow in the Flock

You keep out of sight, flitting among your friends’ shadows.

Encounter      Shadow
Move Action      Personal

Requirement: You must be adjacent to an ally.

Effect: You shift up to your speed. If you end this movement adjacent to an ally, you can make a Stealth check to become hidden from enemies that are not adjacent to you. For this check, you ignore the -5 penalty for moving more than 2 squares.


Published in Dragon Magazine 411.
Shadow in the Flock.flavor: You keep out of sight, flitting among your friends’ shadows.
Shadow in the Flock.requirement: You must be adjacent to an ally.

Ancestral Wings.name: Ancestral Wings
Ancestral Wings.fullText:
Kenku Racial Utility 10Ancestral Wings

The spirits of your ancestors grant you shadowy wings.

Daily      Primal
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you have a fly speed equal to your speed (altitude limit 4).


Published in Dragon Magazine 411.
Ancestral Wings.flavor: The spirits of your ancestors grant you shadowy wings.
Ancestral Wings.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you have a fly speed equal to your speed (altitude limit 4).
